nodes.text: Tellulon was a Rebel spy who pretended to be a technician for the Empire.

During the Empire Day festivities of 1 ABY, he resided in the Imperial Fortress on Yavin 4. It was here that that he met an unknown Rebel, sent to meet him by an unidentified Rebel contact. Tellulon spoke of an Imperial named Arlo, who was having second thoughts about being part of the Empire. Arlo had somewhat of a working relationship with Tellulon, as he was an assistant technician. Tellulon suggested to the Rebel that he speak to Arlo about defecting to the Alliance.
He also instructed the Rebel to seek out Colonel Verks when his work was finished.

Tellulon, was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. During the Empire Day live event from June 29, 2005 to July 11, 2005 he could be found in the Imperial Fortress. He was part of a quest titled, "Happy Empire Day," which would send players on an important mission throughout the galaxy.
